message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.docquery.builder.AdhocQueryRequestBuilder' import. Should be before 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.docquery.entity.proxy.EntityDocQueryProxyWebServiceUnsecuredImpl'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.docquery.model.DocumentMetadata' import. Should be before 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.messaging.builder.impl.NhinTargetCommunitiesBuilderImpl'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.docquery.model.DocumentMetadataResults' import. Should be before 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.messaging.builder.impl.NhinTargetCommunitiesBuilderImpl'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.docquery.model.builder.DocumentMetadataResultsModelBuilder' import. Should be before 'gov.hhs.fha.nhinc.messaging.builder.impl.NhinTargetCommunitiesBuilderImpl'.
At-clauses have to appear in the order '[@author, @version, @param, @return, @throws, @exception, @see, @since, @serial, @serialField, @serialData, @deprecated]'.
First sentence should end with a period.
